segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 11
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 11

segments.pli: 1. Nissayavagga
segments.en: 1. Dependence

segments.pli: 3. Paṭhamaupanisāsutta
segments.en: 3. Vital Conditions (1st)

segments.pli: “Dussīlassa, bhikkhave, sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro.
segments.en: “Mendicants, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for having no regrets.

segments.pli: Avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ.
segments.en: When there are regrets, one who has regrets has destroyed a vital condition for joy.

segments.pli: Pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti.
segments.en: When there is no joy, one who lacks joy has destroyed a vital condition for rapture.

segments.pli: Pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi.
segments.en: When there is no rapture, one who lacks rapture has destroyed a vital condition for tranquility.

segments.pli: Passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sukhaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no tranquility, one who lacks tranquility has destroyed a vital condition for bliss.

segments.pli: Sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi.
segments.en: When there is no bliss, one who lacks bliss has destroyed a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: Sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no right immersion, one who lacks right immersion has destroyed a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti nibbidā.
segments.en: When there is no true knowledge and vision, one who lacks true knowledge and vision has destroyed a vital condition for disillusionment.

segments.pli: Nibbidāya asati nibbidāvipannassa hatūpaniso hoti virāgo.
segments.en: When there is no disillusionment, one who lacks disillusionment has destroyed a vital condition for dispassion.

segments.pli: Virāge asati virāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no dispassion, one who lacks dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that lacked branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would not grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro,
segments.en: In the same way, an unethical person, who lacks ethics, has destroyed a vital condition for having no regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ … pe …
segments.en: When there are regrets, one who has regrets has destroyed a vital condition for joy. …

segments.pli: vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is no dispassion, one who lacks dispassion has destroyed a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Sīlavato, bhikkhave, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
segments.en: An ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for not having regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ,
segments.en: When there are no regrets, one who has no regrets has fulfilled a vital condition for joy.

segments.pli: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti,
segments.en: When there is joy, one who has fulfilled joy has fulfilled a vital condition for rapture.

segments.pli: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi,
segments.en: When there is rapture, one who has fulfilled rapture has fulfilled a vital condition for tranquility.

segments.pli: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sukhaṃ,
segments.en: When there is tranquility, one who has fulfilled tranquility has fulfilled a vital condition for bliss.

segments.pli: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi,
segments.en: When there is bliss, one who has fulfilled bliss has fulfilled a vital condition for right immersion.

segments.pli: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ,
segments.en: When there is right immersion, one who has fulfilled right immersion has fulfilled a vital condition for true knowledge and vision.

segments.pli: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti nibbidā,
segments.en: When there is true knowledge and vision, one who has fulfilled true knowledge and vision has fulfilled a vital condition for disillusionment.

segments.pli: nibbidāya sati nibbidāsampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virāgo,
segments.en: When there is disillusionment, one who has fulfilled disillusionment has fulfilled a vital condition for dispassion.

segments.pli: virāge sati virāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
segments.en: When there is dispassion, one who has fulfilled dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati.
segments.en: Suppose there was a tree that was complete with branches and foliage. Its shoots, bark, softwood, and heartwood would grow to fullness.

segments.pli: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
segments.en: In the same way, an ethical person, who has fulfilled ethics, has fulfilled a vital condition for not having regrets.

segments.pli: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti … pe …
segments.en: When there are no regrets, one who has no regrets has fulfilled a vital condition for joy. …

segments.pli: vimuttiñāṇadassanan”ti.
segments.en: When there is dispassion, one who has fulfilled dispassion has fulfilled a vital condition for knowledge and vision of freedom.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.
